sentence: In particular, Dr. Mehmet Oz, a Pennsylvania Senate candidate, has made Covid a central theme of his campaign, running two ads that criticize the federal government’s response.
title: The GOP’s midterm playbook: Flip the script on Covid

sentence: +8 View gallery +8 View gallery Former Democratic Rep. Tulsi Gabbard (left) and Dr. Mehmet Oz (right) will both be appearing at the Conservative Political Action Conference in Orlando, Florida, where it was moved to get away from strict COVID-19 protocols +8 View gallery So far, former Rep. Tulsi Gabbard is the only prominent Democrat slated to appear at CPAC, a gathering for those on the political right.
title: 'P***ed off' conservatives gather in Orlando for 'awake not woke' CPAC conference as organizer Matt Schlapp says Americans are tired of being told what to do by the Biden administration

sentence: There are seven people running for the PA senate seat including two women, one white, one black: Kathy Barnette (Republican): MAGA businesswoman from Montgomery County, occasional Fox News commentator; Jeff Bartos (Republican): A real estate investor from Montgomery County; Sean Gale (Republican): A lawyer from Montgomery County; David McCormick (Republican) A former CEO of one of the world's largest hedge funds; Mehmet Oz (Republican): A TV celebrity doctor; Carla Sands (Republican): from Mechanicsburg, Trumps' former ambassador to Denmark; George Bochetto (Republican): A Philadelphia defense attorney who sued the city over boxing-up of a statue of Christopher Columbus.
author: Jordan Dixon-Hamilton
title: Donald Trump Endorses Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania U.S. Senate Race
